effect.scarlet_violet: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.the_teal_mask: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.the_indigo_disk: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that boosts the Speed stats of itself and its allies for four turns.
